Text:
Why only "remove" :P
I want to add stuff.. xD

Hehe, I don't know. The program is first of all meant for people who hate all the weird icons, buttons and functions, like nudge, winks and "What's hot". 
The Polygamy (Multi-MSN) function is great. This is letting you login with more than one email adress :)
It would have been nice if someone would constantly seed this _small_ torrent. This is my only pc, and it's not turned off the whole day + I'm using it at school. Thanks! :)
